issue.title: [CF 39] Temporary enchants for ranged weapons
issue.body:
Since 4.0.1 rogues can poison their ranged weapons, so it would be great if the ranged slot could also be monitored by the temporary enchant module.

Thanks in advance and keep up the good work!


> Posted by CurseForge user erwinmeier | Imported from CurseForge issue #39 | Raw

comments.body:
Already implemented in the latest beta release.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
